maple: A005587:=z*(-14+28*z-20*z**2+5*z**3)/(z-1)**5; # _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.seq(numbperm(n,4)/24-numbperm(n,3)/6, n=7..46); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 20 2008a:=n->(sum(numbcomp(n,4), j=9..n)):seq(a(n)/4, n=8..47); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Aug 26 2008
